description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Shift between gameplay while the visuals are shifting colors.  Each round starts as a puzzle game and ends as a dual-stick shooter.  The better you solve the puzzle the fewer enemies you have to fight.  Choose how you want to play.  The full game contains 15 levels, 15 colors, 15 enemies and a procedurally generated soundtrack.
